name: Targeting the sound
description:
Click the screen to align the cursor!

A and D to rotate your cursor.

Space to shoot sound waves.

  • The Sound Wave will get destroyed when it hit the target
  • Use that to locate the target
  • After some time, your sound wave will destroy itself

When you located the target, click it.

Use the sound effect to help you.

You have limited guesses.

Play in Gandi IDE: https://cocrea.world/@Fath11/targetingthesound
